data.name: The Hundred Year Kingdom Art Book
data.detailed_description: Original art book featuring profiles of the goddesses and in-depth descriptions of every world, structure, and building. Each page lets you immerse yourself in the history and calm atmosphere of The Hundred Year Kingdom.
data.about_the_game: Original art book featuring profiles of the goddesses and in-depth descriptions of every world, structure, and building. Each page lets you immerse yourself in the history and calm atmosphere of The Hundred Year Kingdom.
data.short_description: Create a world free of conflict in this innovative turn-based simulation. Work together with a mythical young goddess to develop a peaceful civilization over the course of a century.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
